department: Commissariat à la magistrature fédérale Canada
description: JBS Information Systems Inc. has been selected to provide information technology (IT) services to various departments and government entities beginning April 2009. The contract is worth $36,128,500,000 (Nineteen billion four hundred forty million two hundred thirteen thousand two hundred dollars) and is expected to last for five years.
full_summary:
**FreeBalance Accountability Suite Migration and Upgrade Tender Announcement**

The Office of the Commissioner for Federal Judicial Affairs Canada (FJA) is seeking a supplier to assist in migrating and upgrading its FreeBalance Accountability Suite to Version 7.

**Reference Information**

* Solicitation Number: FJA-2023-005
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-13T17:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-07-24
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-07-23
* Contracting Entity: Office of the Commissioner for Federal Judicial Affairs Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 800-99 Metcalfe ST, Ottawa, ON, K1A 1E3 Canada

**Background**

The FJA was scheduled to transition to the Treasury Board Secretariat’s GCfm solution, but the project was cancelled in 2021. As a result, the FJA requires a relatively urgent migration from Version 6.5 to Version 7 of the FreeBalance Accountability Suite as part of its Financial System Renewal (FSR) project. This upgrade will enable the FJA to adopt an affordable and sustainable solution that will benefit the organization in the coming years.

**Statement of Capabilities**

Any interested supplier must demonstrate, by way of a statement of capabilities, that they meet the following minimum essential requirements:

* Experience in deploying the FreeBalance Accountability Suite software
* Experience in upgrading FreeBalance Accountability Suite (version 6.5) modules to Version 7
* Experience in FreeBalance software data mapping and metadata management and integration
* Experience in gathering requirements and performing business process workshops for financial and material management solutions
* Experience in delivering user training for the FreeBalance Accountability Suite solution
* Experience in knowledge transfer of functional and technical aspects of the FreeBalance Accountability Suite solution

**Pre-identified Supplier**

FreeBalance Inc. has proprietary rights to the FreeBalance Accountability Suite software used by the FJA. As the sole developer of the software, FreeBalance Inc. is the exclusive owner of the underlying intellectual property.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPaFTA).

**Submission of Statements of Capabilities**
